title: WHO WE ARE
description: We are the team behind <lorcanito>Lorcanito.com</lorcanito>, a community driven table top simulator for Disney Lorcana. We're taking our learning and creating an open-source project that can be applied to many card games.

howWeStarted.title: How We Started
howWeStarted.description: This community was founded to solve a simple problem: not everyone has access to a local TCG scene. We believe that your location or life circumstances shouldn't be a barrier to enjoying and mastering the games you love. The Card Goat was created to be the online home for every TCG player looking for a place to practice, learn, and connect.

whyJoin.title: Why You Should Join
whyJoin.description: We are a non-profit, fan-based community dedicated to helping you get better. We provide the tools, resources, and a supportive space for players of all skill levels to improve their game.

successStory.content: We've helped busy parents, working professionals, and players without local gaming communities transform into regional tournament champions!

roadmap.title: Our Roadmap
roadmap.description: We're just getting started! Our community is building momentum as we develop tools for popular trading card games.

milestone.content: Fully functional tools for Disney Lorcana, Gundam, and Riftbound

roadmap.futureGames: Grand Archive, One Piece, Alpha Clash, Flesh and Blood
roadmap.joinEarly: Join us early and help shape our community! 🐐
